Could you add a comment above the `license_file` line that is something like:

```
# license file manually packaged. Please see https://github.com/anxuae/setuptools-cythonize/pull/4
license_file: LICENSE
```

This will be a reminder to check if in future releases whether the license file has been added to the source distribution.
Done! And thanks for opening the PR!
